name: Project Mars (divyanshkhare)
description:
Project Mars is based on the ever
increasing speculation and excitement of
what it's like being in a space colony.
Players are part of colonial factions on
Mars, pitted against each other to fight for
territorial superiority. Project Mars is a card
game of choices and consequences, where
skill, not luck, is your greatest weapon.

Link to game website : https://t-98.github.io/artg-80g-wireframe/

Link to playing cards.io: https://playingcards.io/jfkb4g
